### Elephant

![[Bestiaryimages/elephant.webp|cover ws-med frame right]]

_Mighty mammals with tough hide, flappy ears, and a trunk._

**LV** 7, **AL** N
**AC** 14, **HP** 34, **MV** near
**ATK** 2 tusks +6 (1d8)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 5 | 0 | 3 | -2 | 1 | 0 |

**Charge:** Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 tusks attack. If hit, x3 damage.
